snippet: Yesterday's glorious sun and bracing air, brought out hundreds to view the Exhibition at Castle Garden. The Garden is rapidly filling with goods, and the Machinery is nearly ready to be put in operation. The accessions which are daily made to the ...
lead_paragraph: Yesterday's glorious sun and bracing air, brought out hundreds to view the Exhibition at Castle Garden. The Garden is rapidly filling with goods, and the Machinery is nearly ready to be put in operation. The accessions which are daily made to the number of entries, are, we are glad to see, of a substantial character;
